title: Unraveling Privacy Risks of Individual Fairness in Graph Neural Networks
abstract: arXiv:2301.12951v2 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: Graph neural networks (GNNs) have gained significant attraction due to their expansive real-world applications. To build trustworthy GNNs, two aspects - fairness and privacy - have emerged as critical considerations. Previous studies have separately examined the fairness and privacy aspects of GNNs, revealing their trade-off with GNN performance. Yet, the interplay between these two aspects remains unexplored. In this paper, we pioneer the exploration of the interaction between the privacy risks of edge leakage and the individual fairness of a GNN. Our theoretical analysis unravels that edge privacy risks unfortunately escalate when the nodes' individual fairness improves. Such an issue hinders the accomplishment of privacy and fairness of GNNs at the same time. translated_title: 揭示图神经网络中个体公平性的隐私风险
translated_abstract: 图神经网络（GNNs）由于其广泛的实际应用而受到了极大关注。要构建值得信赖的GNNs，公平性和隐私两个方面已成为重要考虑因素。以往的研究分别考察了GNNs的公平性和隐私性，揭示了它们与GNN性能之间的权衡。然而，这两个方面之间的相互作用尚未被探究。本文探索了边缘泄漏的隐私风险与GNN的个体公平性之间的相互作用。我们的理论分析揭示了当节点的个体公平性提高时，边缘隐私风险不幸地升级。这一问题阻碍了GNNs同时实现隐私和公平。为了平衡公平和隐私，我们谨慎地引入了基于影响函数的公平感知损失重加权和基于隐私感知的图结构扰动模块。
tldr: 本文揭示了图神经网络中边缘泄漏的隐私风险与个体公平性之间的相互作用，发现当节点的个体公平性提高时，隐私风险会升级，影响GNNs同时实现隐私和公平，为此提出了平衡公平和隐私的解决方案。
en_tdlr: This paper uncovers the interaction between edge leakage privacy risks and individual fairness in graph neural networks, revealing that the escalation of privacy risks hinders GNNs from achieving privacy and fairness simultaneously when individual fairness improves, and proposes a solution to balance fairness and privacy.
